item.title: Multi-View Guided Multi-View Stereo
item.author: Author
item.description: Matteo Poggi* &middot Andrea Conti* &middot Stefano Mattoccia *joint authorship [code] [paper] [demo] RGB image Dilated sparse depth hints Prediction without hints Prediction with hints Multi-View Guided Multi-View Stereo. Deep MVS network struggle at generalizing from synthetic to real images, yielding inaccurate depth maps and poor 3D reconstruction. By guiding the network with a aset of sparse depth measurements, aggregated over the multiple views, we can greatly ameliorate the results.
